translation.en: I have pineapples! I have strawberry!
-I have grapes! I have grapefruit! -[bell ringing]
We had a plan, Carter, and you done goofed it.
The plan's still on.
The plan was for you to get me B's.
translation.de: Du solltest mir eine Zwei verschaffen.

translation.en: -Does this look like a freaking B? -I just want what's best for you.
translation.de: -Sieht das nach einer Zwei aus? -Ich habe mich für dich angestrengt.

translation.en: You know when the last time I got an A was?
translation.de: Weißt du, wann ich die letzte Eins hatte?

translation.en: Okay, I'll act more stupid next time.
translation.de: Nächstes Mal mache ich einen auf dümmer.

translation.en: Completely moronic and idiotic. Beyond obtuse.
translation.de: Ich mache einen auf totaler Volltrottel.

translation.en: Yeah. Totally.
That's what I'm talking about.
You making fun of me? You're dead this time, Carter.
translation.de: Du machst dich lustig über mich? Diesmal bist du tot.

translation.en: [man] What the...
-[barking] -Hey! You go on now, little mutt.
Go on. Go on, dog. I'll turn you into a hot dog. Now, go on.
translation.de: Hau ab, sonst mache ich aus dir einen Hotdog. Verschwinde.

translation.en: [man] I have grapefruit!
I have pineapples! I have strawberries!
Thank you very much.
Have a nice day. Be careful with the cars.
translation.de: Schönen Tag. Und gib auf die Autos acht.

translation.en: -You, too. -Okay.
-[Carter] Hey. -[sighs] There you are.
-You're late. Again. -Come on. I wanna go to Sam's.
translation.de: -Du kommst wieder mal spät. -Komm. Ich will zu Sam.

translation.en: I was practicing for my recital.
I'm gonna do five pirouettes all on my own.
translation.de: Ich mache ganz alleine fünf Pirouetten.

translation.en: -It's called a solo. You know that, right? -That's cool, Frankie.
translation.de: -Das nennt man Solo, weißt du das? -Das ist toll, Frankie.

translation.en: [Frankie] And I'm gonna dance in New York, in Swan Lake, and be crazy famous.
translation.de: Ich werde in New York Schwanensee tanzen und ein Star sein.

translation.en: [Carter] But I'll still talk to you.
translation.de: Aber ich rede dann trotzdem noch mit dir.

translation.en: [Frankie] Why wouldn't you talk to me?
translation.de: Warum solltest du es nicht tun?

translation.en: [Carter] Because famous people are always stuck up.
[Frankie] I am not.
And I'm gonna wear my boots to do my pirouettes.
translation.de: Ich ziehe meine Stiefel an und mache meine Pirouetten.

translation.en: [Carter] Good luck with that.
Hey. You are coming, right?
-To my recital? -Yeah, sure.
If you don't come and Mom has to work, nobody will be there.
translation.de: Wenn du nicht kommst und Mama arbeiten muss, kommt niemand.

translation.en: You'll be great.
I'll be there, Frankie.
I promise.
That is if I invite you.
The tickets are for very important people only.
translation.de: Die Karten sind nur für wichtige Leute.

translation.en: -Come on, let's get in the street car. -No, we can't!
translation.de: -Los, in die Straßenbahn. -Nein, das geht nicht.

translation.en: -You're the one who wanted to go to Sam's. -Wait, Frankie.
-I wanna walk. -It'll be fine. Come on.
Why do you have strawberries?
What are you talking about?
I saw you have strawberries in your pocket in the car.
translation.de: Wieso hast du Erdbeeren in deiner Tasche?

translation.en: [Carter] I don't have any strawberries.
[Frankie] I saw something red and green.
[Carter] I don't have any strawberries in my pocket.
translation.de: Ich habe keine Erdbeeren in der Tasche.

translation.en: [Frankie] Well, it smeared on the chair and you didn't wipe it up.
translation.de: Du hast den Sitz damit verschmiert und nicht sauber gemacht.

translation.en: [Frankie] What do you mean you don't believe me?
translation.de: AMERIKAS BELIEBTESTE GEISTER- UND VAMPIR-TOUR Wie, du glaubst mir nicht?

translation.en: [Carter] You're gonna fly to Paris to dance? Not gonna happen.
translation.de: Du willst in Paris tanzen? Das klappt nie.

translation.en: [Frankie] It will happen. I know it.
You know you need to punch Pig-Face in the face, right?
-Frankie... I don't care. -He'll bully you your whole life.
[Carter] I'm not gonna fight back. I'd lose.
translation.de: Wenn ich mich wehre, verliere ich.

translation.en: [Frankie] Why are we going here again? It's just a waste of time.
translation.de: Was sollen wir wieder hier? Es ist Zeitverschwendung.

translation.en: [Carter] Because you never know, it could change sometimes.
translation.de: Man weiß nie, vielleicht ändert es sich.

translation.en: -Maybe he's in a good mood today. -In your dreams.
translation.de: -Vielleicht hat er heute gute Laune. -Träum weiter.

translation.en: [Carter] Hi, Mr. King. We're here for the watch.
translation.de: Hallo, Mr. King. Wir kommen wegen der Uhr.

translation.en: [Carter] $4 and 26, 27, 28 cents.
That brings the total to $34 and 18... No, 19 cents.
translation.de: Damit wären wir bei $34 und 18... Nein, 19 Cent.

translation.en: Not bad, am I right?
-How much more do we have to go? -Oh, you don't even wanna know.
translation.de: -Wie viel fehlt noch? -Sage ich euch besser nicht.

translation.en: we've been coming here twice a week for a long time.
translation.de: Wir kommen schon so lange zweimal die Woche her.

translation.en: You can at least take the watch out of the "For Sale" case.
translation.de: Sie könnten die Uhr aus der "Zu verkaufen"-Kiste nehmen.

translation.en: Please. He meant to say please.
I take it out of the case, people can't see it.
People can't see it, people can't buy it.
But we're gonna buy it. Eventually.
translation.de: Aber wir werden sie kaufen. Irgendwann.

translation.en: Listen, I told both of you when we started this whole cockamamieness,
translation.de: Ich habe euch beiden damals gesagt,

translation.en: that if somebody wants the watch, I'll let you know.
translation.de: wenn jemand die Uhr will, sage ich es euch.

translation.en: -Give you a chance to buy it first. -Yeah, but we should have--
translation.de: -Dann kannst du sie als Erster kaufen. -Aber...

translation.en: [Sam] There's no buts.
When I bought it from your mother, I paid her good money.
translation.de: Ich zahlte deiner Mutter viel Geld dafür.

translation.en: This is a business. Barely, but it is.
translation.de: Das ist ein Geschäft. Wenn auch ein schlechtes.

translation.en: Mr. King, I promise you'll get money. We're at, like, $34 and 19 cents.
translation.de: Wir bringen das Geld. Versprochen. Wir sind schon bei $34 und 19 Cent.

translation.en: -Baby, you see how old I am? -Old.
A hundred?
You're not really helping your case.
translation.de: Das ist deiner Sache nicht förderlich.

translation.en: The point is, at this rate, you guys will be bringing my money to the cemetery.
translation.de: Wenn ihr in dem Tempo weitermacht, bringt ihr mir das Geld auf den Friedhof.

translation.en: I don't like the cemetery.
Listen, a guy came in, he liked the watch. I told him it ran slow.
translation.de: Es kam einer, dem die Uhr gefiel. Ich sagte, sie geht nach.

translation.en: It doesn't run slow.
My father kept it in perfect condition, and you know that.
translation.de: Mein Vater hielt sie perfekt in Stand. Das wissen Sie.

translation.en: The point is, pudding head, he's not wearing it, is he?
translation.de: Die Sache ist die: Er trägt sie nicht, oder, Dummerchen?

translation.en: Mr. King, of all the people I don't like in this world,
translation.de: Mr. King, von allen Leuten, die ich nicht mag,

translation.en: I like you the best.
You and every other woman in my life.
translation.de: Wie alle Frauen, die ich hatte.

translation.en: Now, you two, get out of here.
-We're just gonna keep coming back. -Yeah, like a rash.
-See ya tomorrow. -Take care.
-[Frankie] That was a waste of time. -No, it wasn't. We added more money.
translation.de: -Das war Zeitverschwendung. -Nein. Wir haben wieder was gezahlt.

translation.en: Next time, it'll be less money that we have to add.
translation.de: Nächstes Mal bleibt weniger Geld zu bezahlen.

translation.en: You've been giving Mr. King your lunch money. I know you have.
translation.de: Du hast Mr. King dein Essensgeld gegeben. Ich weiß das.

translation.en: [Carter] Maybe I wouldn't have to if Mom hadn't sold Dad's watch.
translation.de: Hätte Mama nicht Papas Uhr verkauft, wäre das nicht nötig.

translation.en: Lots of things aren't very good in life. Get used to it.
translation.de: Vieles im Leben ist nicht so toll. Gewöhn dich dran.

translation.en: You get used to being grounded forever or longer when Mom finds out.
translation.de: Gewöhn du dich an ewigen Hausarrest, wenn Mama das erfährt.

translation.en: [Frankie] I was here first.
[Carter] I'm older, so it doesn't matter. I'm always first.
translation.de: Ich bin älter. Ich komme immer zuerst.

translation.en: Mom doesn't like it when you double dip.
translation.de: Mama mag nicht, wenn du zweimal reintunkst.

translation.en: Mom's not here, so if you just shut your mouth for once, you'll be fine.
translation.de: Mama ist nicht da, also kannst du den Mund halten.

translation.en: Fine. I can keep my mouth shut so much that I'll never talk to you
translation.de: Ich kann den Mund halten und nicht mehr mit dir reden,

translation.en: for all the time in all the universes in all the world.
translation.de: für immer und ewig und überall auf der ganzen Welt.

translation.en: [Carter] Thank goodness.
Carter can't come to the phone right now.
translation.de: Carter kann gerade nicht ans Telefon.

translation.en: Please don't leave a message after the beep. Beep!
translation.de: Bitte hinterlassen Sie keine Nachricht nach dem Piepton.

translation.en: Just look!
If you are satisfied with your message, please press "1" or hang up.
translation.de: Speichern Sie Ihre Nachricht mit "1" oder legen Sie auf.

translation.en: Carter, just listen to me!
What?
No way.
I can't believe it. How did you even get up here?
translation.de: Ich glaube es nicht. Wie bist du hier hoch gekommen?

translation.en: [Frankie] You know this dog?
[Carter] I was trying to get him to follow us home from school.
translation.de: Ich wollte, dass er uns nach Hause folgt.

translation.en: -I knew you were doing something not good. -Come on. Good boy.
translation.de: -Ich wusste, du führst was im Schilde. -Komm. Brav.

translation.en: Come here. Good boy.
-What's your name, bud? -He's a stray.
Where did you come from?
A trash can?
He smells worse than your side of the room.
translation.de: Er stinkt schlimmer als deine Seite des Zimmers.

translation.en: You're right. Let's fix it.
translation.de: Du hast recht. Wir müssen was tun.

translation.en: [folk song playing] ♪ I love my dog as much as I love you ♪
translation.de: Ich liebe meinen Hund Genauso sehr wie dich

translation.en: ♪ But you may fade My dog will always come through ♪
translation.de: Aber auch wenn du gehst Mein Hund bleibt

translation.en: ♪ All the pay I need Comes shining through his eyes ♪
translation.de: Seine leuchtenden Augen Sind aller Lohn, den ich brauche

translation.en: ♪ I don't need no cold water To make me realize ♪
translation.de: Ich brauche kein kaltes Wasser Um zu begreifen

translation.en: ♪ That I love my dog As much as I love you ♪
translation.de: Dass ich meinen Hund Genauso liebe wie dich

translation.en: ♪ But you may fade My dog will always come through ♪
translation.de: Aber auch wenn du gehst Mein Hund bleibt

translation.en: Carter, what are we gonna do about Mom?
translation.de: Carter, was machen wir mit Mama?

translation.en: What about her?
She's gonna freak out.
You asked for a bulldog for Christmas, and you got a stuffed animal.
translation.de: Du wolltest eine Bulldogge und hast ein Plüschtier bekommen.

translation.en: Which is why we're not gonna tell her. He's just gonna stay in our room for now.
translation.de: Darum sagen wir es ihr nicht. Er bleibt erst mal in unserem Zimmer.

translation.en: Where's he gonna pee and poo?
translation.de: Wo soll er pinkeln und kacken?

translation.en: In your bed?
Just until I can convince her.
translation.de: Nur bis ich sie überredet habe.

translation.en: It's Mom. We'll never convince her. Like, ever.
translation.de: Mama lässt sich nicht überreden. Niemals.

translation.en: -Oh, crap. -Oh, no.
Where are my two favorite people that help Mom out?
-[Carter] Hey, Mom. -Hi, Mommy!
You're the best mommy of all the mommies in all the world!
translation.de: Du bist die beste Mama von allen Mamas der Welt!

translation.en: [Carter] Definitely, you're the best.
What'd you break?
[both] Nothing.
[Whitney] So there were four accidents today. Four!
translation.de: Heute gab es vier Unfälle. Vier!

translation.en: I was driving the ambulance 80 miles per hour.
translation.de: Ich fuhr den Krankenwagen mit 130 km/h.

translation.en: [Carter] That's a lot, Mom.
[Whitney] Forks on the left, hon.
-Car, is all your homework done? -[Carter] It will be.
Here you go, Madame. Mushrooms on top.
How about you, Mr. Man. Anything exciting happen at school today?
translation.de: Was ist mit dir, mein Großer? War in der Schule irgendwas los?

translation.en: Pig-Face happened.
Your death is about to happen.
[Whitney] Again? That's the third time. Okay, that's it. I'm calling the school.
translation.de: Schon wieder? Das ist das dritte Mal. Jetzt rufe ich in der Schule an.

translation.en: Don't blow this up like you blow everything up.
translation.de: Blas das nicht so auf, wie du alles aufbläst.

translation.en: I'm not blowing anything up.
I wanna know who this kid is.
translation.de: Ich will wissen, wer das ist.

translation.en: I told you, Pig-Face.
-Can you butt out, Frankie? -Carter, what happened? Tell me the truth.
translation.de: -Hältst du die Klappe? -Was ist passiert? Sag mir die Wahrheit.

translation.en: -Carter, just-- -You don't wanna know the truth.
-[Carter whispers] No. -[Whitney] Straight up, Carter.
-Are you scared of this kid? -No.
translation.de: Hast du Angst vor dem Jungen?

translation.en: [Whitney] 'Cause if you are, that's nothing...
-Go. -...to be ashamed of.
-[Whitney] Just let me help you. -[chuckles] No. No.
Here you go. No mushrooms.
Um, actually, can I have mushrooms, please?
-You hate mushrooms. -But taste buds change every seven years.
-That's a scientific fact. -He's right. Very, very right.
[Whitney] Mushrooms.
I'm just worried about you, Carter.
translation.de: Ich mache mir bloß Sorgen um dich.

translation.en: -You're worried about everything. -That is not true.
translation.de: -Du sorgst dich wegen allem. -Das ist nicht wahr.

translation.en: Okay, maybe that is a little bit true. A little bit.
Anyway, here you go.
What is going on with you guys?
-Nothing. -Nothing.
I feel like you're hiding something from me.
translation.de: Ihr tut, als verheimlicht ihr was.

translation.en: Okay. Mom, let's just calm down and eat our food.
translation.de: Ok, Mama. Beruhige dich und iss.

translation.en: -[sighs] -Okay, I...
I know that things have been hard,
translation.de: ...es ist in letzter Zeit nicht einfach.

translation.en: and you guys wake up in the morning and I'm already at work,
translation.de: Ihr wacht morgens auf, und ich bin schon arbeiten,

translation.en: and you've been on your own a lot lately.
But I just want you to know that you can talk to me, you know?
translation.de: Aber ihr sollt wissen, dass ihr mit mir reden könnt.

translation.en: Really, I'm right here. [chuckles]
We do talk to you, Mom.
Don't worry.
We love you, Mom, to the moon and back.
translation.de: Wir haben dich lieb, bis zum Mond und wieder zurück.

translation.en: To the moon and back.
translation.de: Bis zum Mond und wieder zurück.

translation.en: [Carter] This is the Aitken Basin, formed 4.5 billion years ago,
translation.de: Das ist das Aitken-Becken, entstanden vor 4,5 Milliarden Jahren.

translation.en: which in dog years is a lot.
My dad showed it to me on an electron telescope
translation.de: Papa zeigte es mir mit dem Elektronenteleskop

translation.en: at the planetarium he ran.
translation.de: in dem Planetarium, das er leitete.

translation.en: Wanna know something more interesting?
This is my favorite ballerina book. Isn't she pretty?
translation.de: Mein Lieblingsballettbuch. Ist sie nicht hübsch?

translation.en: -Hey, stop chewing on that. -[whines]
And this is the Nutcracker.
It's about an evil rat king.
-Die, Rat King, die. -[barks]
Mom will hear you.
Hey, what if we named him Michael Jordan?
translation.de: Wie wär's, wir nennen ihn Michael Jordan?

translation.en: That's the dumbest name for a dog I've ever heard.
translation.de: Das ist der doofste Hundename, den ich je gehört habe.

translation.en: Okay. What about Copernicus?
What is going on in your mind? No.
translation.de: Was ist mit dir los? Nein.

translation.en: This is my favorite, Sleeping Beauty. There's a lot of kissing.
translation.de: Das ist mein Lieblingsbuch. Dornröschen. Da wird viel geküsst.

translation.en: [Carter] Look, Benjamin Franklin had a dog.
He thought they were more reliable than people.
translation.de: Er fand Hunde verlässlicher als Menschen.

translation.en: That's not very interesting.
Yeah, but what about Benjamin, as his name?
translation.de: Ja, aber wie wäre Benjamin als Name?

translation.en: Mmm... What about Benji?
He does look kind of like a Benji. He's old and new at the same time.
translation.de: Er sieht aus wie ein Benji. Er ist alt und gleichzeitig jung.

translation.en: Good boy. Good boy.
[Carter] Dad would let us keep Benji.
translation.de: Papa würde uns Benji behalten lassen.

translation.en: I don't wanna say goodbye to Benji.
translation.de: Ich will nicht von Benji Abschied nehmen.

translation.en: I don't like goodbye.
Promise me we won't have to.
translation.de: Versprich, dass wir es nicht müssen.

translation.en: Hey, I promise you, Fritter.
[Frankie] I love you, guys.
[Carter] I love you too, Frankie.
[Frankie] And now I lay me down to sleep,
translation.de: Jetzt schlaf ich ein in meinem Nest

translation.en: I pray the Lord for this dog to keep.
translation.de: und bete, dass Gott den Hund mir lässt.

translation.en: And that I will do incredible at my recital.
translation.de: Und dass mein Auftritt ganz toll wird.

translation.en: And that my spelling teacher will quit her job forever and never come back.
translation.de: Und dass meine Diktatlehrerin kündigt und nie wiederkommt.

translation.en: And that Mommy will not have to worry so much.
translation.de: Und dass Mami sich nicht so sorgen muss.

translation.en: And that I'll never have to eat any more mushrooms as long as I live.
translation.de: Und dass ich mein Leben lang keine Pilze mehr essen muss.

translation.en: Good night, Benji.
[Whitney] I don't know what to do, you know?
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, was ich tun soll.

translation.en: They're getting so big, and they're so smart,
translation.de: Sie werden groß und sind so klug,

translation.en: and they catch on to things and...
translation.de: und sie begreifen schon so viel...

translation.en: And I'm trying to keep everything together.
translation.de: Und ich versuche, alles unter einen Hut zu bringen.

translation.en: It's like I'm nothing but a nag.
translation.de: Aber ich nörgle ständig bloß rum.

translation.en: All of a sudden, I'm so serious.
translation.de: Ich bin auf einmal so ernst.

translation.en: Every day I feel like I'm messing them up and letting them down.
translation.de: Ich habe jeden Tag das Gefühl, sie zu enttäuschen.

translation.en: I don't know how to be in three places at once.
translation.de: Ich müsste immer an drei Orten gleichzeitig sein können.

translation.en: So, feel free to give me some advice
translation.de: Also, ich würde mich über einen Rat freuen,

translation.en: or one of your lame science jokes, or...
translation.de: oder über einen deiner dämlichen Wissenschaftlerwitze oder...

translation.en: a carton of ice cream and bingeing...
'cause I could really use it. [sniffles]
[Whitney] Just a quick kiss before I go to work.
translation.de: Nur ein kleiner Kuss, bevor ich zur Arbeit gehe.

translation.en: -Carter? -Good morning, Mom.
What is that?
A stuffed animal. [stammers] An animatronic one.
[sighs] Okay. All right. I'm on to you two.
This is why you guys were being weird last night.
translation.de: Darum wart ihr gestern Abend so komisch.

translation.en: He's cute. Mom, look at him.
[sighs] You know what? I expected Carter to lie to me
translation.de: Ich hätte erwartet, dass Carter mich anlügt,

translation.en: because he's almost a teenager, but you?
translation.de: denn er ist fast schon ein Teenager, aber du?

translation.en: Mom, we're not lying. We just didn't tell you yet.
translation.de: Wir haben nicht gelogen. Wir haben nur nichts gesagt.

translation.en: Where did he come from?
Uh, he kind of found me.
On the street, we saved him.
translation.de: Auf der Straße, wir retteten ihn.

translation.en: [Whitney] On the street?
-[whimpers] -All right, I got it.
You're cute, but you are a dog and you poop everywhere,
translation.de: Du bist süß, aber du bist ein Hund, und du kackst überall hin.

translation.en: and you mess everything up, you chew on things,
translation.de: Du machst Chaos und nagst alles an,

translation.en: you keep us up at night.
He loves you, Mommy.
No. Okay? I can barely keep the three of us afloat.
translation.de: Nein. Ok? Ich bringe uns drei schon kaum durch.

translation.en: It's not happening.
Mom, you don't have to worry. We'll take care of him.
translation.de: Mama, mach dir keine Sorgen. Wir sorgen für ihn.

translation.en: I don't have the money or the time.
translation.de: Ich habe weder Geld noch Zeit.

translation.en: It's not happening. I'm taking him to a shelter.
translation.de: Schluss. Ich bringe ihn ins Tierheim.

translation.en: They murder-kill dogs there. You can't take him there.
-No, they don't. -[Carter] Are you kidding me?
A shelter?
They won't even give him three days.
translation.de: Dort überlebt er keine drei Tage.

translation.en: I won't let them hurt him.
translation.de: Ich lasse nicht zu, dass sie ihm was tun.

translation.en: [Carter] Yeah, you will. You don't care.
He's a good boy, and you won't even give him a chance.
translation.de: Er ist brav. Du gibst ihm nicht mal eine Chance.

translation.en: Carter, no, okay?
I'm sorry... I don't...
I can't take care of one more thing right now.
translation.de: Ich kann mich nicht um noch mehr Dinge kümmern.

translation.en: He's not a thing. He's Benji.
translation.de: Er ist kein Ding. Das ist Benji.

translation.en: You named him?
translation.de: Ihr habt ihm einen Namen gegeben?

translation.en: I'm so sorry that you can't handle one more thing right now,
translation.de: Es tut mir leid, dass du dich nicht um noch mehr Dinge kümmern kannst,

translation.en: but what about us?
We take care of each other,
so I'm pretty sure that we can handle a dog.
translation.de: also können wir auch für einen Hund sorgen.

translation.en: Maybe he'll make things fun around here for once.
translation.de: Vielleicht wird es mit ihm hier endlich mal lustig.

translation.en: Oh, I forgot. That's not allowed, either.
translation.de: Stimmt. Das ist hier auch verboten.

translation.en: Carter, no... That's not fair.
-Just leave us alone. -[Benji whines]
I don't even like that stupid dog.
translation.de: Ich mag den blöden Hund gar nicht.

translation.en: Mom won't let you stay.
You'll wind up in a pound.
Just go.
Go, please.
I love you, Benji.
[melancholy song playing] ♪ If your heart believes in dreamin' ♪
translation.de: Wenn dein Herz an Träume glaubt

translation.en: ♪ There's no other place I know ♪
♪ Well, life here rolls on by Without a care for tomorrow ♪
translation.de: Wo das Leben vergeht Ohne Sorgen wegen morgen

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, that was the life for me That was the life for me ♪
translation.de: Ja, das war ein Leben für mich

translation.en: ♪ How long must I travel On this journey? ♪
♪ Guess I'll count a million stars Along the way ♪
translation.de: Ich werde unterwegs wohl Eine Million Sterne zählen

translation.en: ♪ And every time I start to worry ♪
translation.de: Und jedes Mal, wenn ich mich sorge

translation.en: ♪ Something whispers in my ear ♪
♪ Says the words I long to hear ♪
translation.de: Sagt die Worte, die ich ersehne

translation.en: ♪ Almost home ♪
♪ I'm almost home ♪
♪ Might be lost and afraid ♪
translation.de: Ich mag mich verirrt haben Und mich fürchten

translation.en: ♪ But I'm just a dream away ♪
translation.de: Aber ich bin nur einen Traum weit entfernt

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home ♪
♪ Just one more mile And I'll be home free ♪
translation.de: Nur noch eine Meile Dann bin ich daheim

translation.en: ♪ Just one more day Is all my heart needs ♪
translation.de: Nur noch ein Tag Mehr braucht mein Herz nicht

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna get there ♪
♪ Yeah, I'm gonna get there someday ♪
translation.de: Ja, eines Tages werde ich ankommen

translation.en: ♪ Feel so cold and alone But I'm... ♪
translation.de: Es ist so kalt und einsam Aber ich...

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home ♪
-[Frankie] Did you not eat lunch again? -[Carter] I ate lunch.
-Then how come you got more money for Sam? -I don't.
translation.de: -Woher hast du dann das Geld für Sam? -Ich habe keins.

translation.en: Then how come we're going to Sam's?
translation.de: Warum gehen wir dann zu Sam?

translation.en: To get my money back.
If you get our money back, how do we get Dad's watch back?
translation.de: Wie sollen wir dann die Uhr zurückkriegen?

translation.en: Mom doesn't care. She wouldn't let us keep Benji.
translation.de: Mama ist es egal. Sie lässt uns Benji nicht behalten.

translation.en: Why should I care about getting her the watch back?
translation.de: Warum soll ich für sie die Uhr zurückholen?

translation.en: Because we're a family.
[sighs] Whatever.
You're just scared of somebody else buying it.
translation.de: Du hast bloß Angst, dass jemand sie kauft.

translation.en: I'm not scared. I'm realistic, Frankie.
translation.de: Ich habe keine Angst. Ich bin realistisch.

translation.en: I told you she wouldn't let us keep him.
translation.de: Ich wusste, sie lässt ihn uns nicht behalten.

translation.en: You're not real or listic or whatever. You're just chicken.
translation.de: Du bist weder real noch istisch. Du hast bloß Angst.

translation.en: You give up at everything when not very good things happen.
translation.de: Du gibst immer auf, wenn irgendwas Dummes passiert.

translation.en: -Mr. King, we need to talk. -...hold up.
translation.de: Mr. King, ich muss Sie sprechen.

translation.en: Hey, you kids, I sold the watch.
translation.de: Kinder, ich habe die Uhr verkauft.

translation.en: You two go on back home now.
-You what? -Sold the watch.
You sold the watch? That's not right.
-Y'all go on now. Go home. -You know what?
translation.de: -Ihr geht jetzt nach Hause. -Wissen Sie was?

translation.en: I'm gonna call the police and tell them you are a lying liar.
translation.de: Ich rufe die Polizei und sage, Sie sind ein Lügner.

translation.en: You can't sell the watch.
translation.de: Sie dürfen die Uhr nicht verkaufen.

translation.en: -How y'all doing? -[both gasp]
Now, I remember being a kid.
I used to tell my brother there I was gonna beat him with a baseball bat,
translation.de: Ich drohte meinem Bruder immer, ihn mit dem Baseballschläger zu hauen,

translation.en: but I didn't really mean it.
When you say you're gonna go get the police,
translation.de: Wenn du sagst, du rufst die Polizei,

translation.en: that's just you being a kid, right?
translation.de: meinst du das nicht so, oder?

translation.en: [shudders] Yeah, just talking.
translation.de: Ja, das habe ich nur so gesagt.

translation.en: Good, but just in case, y'all are gonna stick around for a while.
translation.de: Gut, aber für alle Fälle bleibt ihr erstmal hier.

translation.en: [Sam] Man, you don't need to handle kids like that.
translation.de: Sie brauchen die Kinder nicht so zu behandeln.

translation.en: -[Syd] Shh. -[Carter] Let go.
[Sam] You don't have to do that. Leave 'em alone!
translation.de: Das ist nicht nötig. Lassen Sie sie!

translation.en: [Syd] Open the safe. Fill the bag. Do it.
-Not until you let them kids go. -Mr. Pawn Man,
put yourself in the shoes of two fellas who would come in here wearing
translation.de: wenn zwei Burschen hier reinkommen und lächerliche Masken tragen,

translation.en: these ridiculous masks. Do I look like I'm playing?
Open the safe! Hurry up.
Y'all calm down.
-Open up the safe, now! -Don't hurt them kids.
translation.de: -Tresor auf! -Lassen Sie die Kinder in Ruhe.

translation.en: Do it, before I hop that counter
translation.de: Los, bevor ich über die Theke springe

translation.en: and slap the taste out your mouth. Come on, hurry up!
translation.de: und dir die Fresse poliere. Los, Beeilung!

translation.en: Speed it up. Come on!
[Sam] Comin'.
You got what you came for. Now go on.
translation.de: Sie haben, was Sie wollten. Jetzt gehen Sie.

translation.en: Tie him up. Let's go.
Move. Come on, back door.
-[Sam] Man, wait. -Tie him up.
-Where you taking them kids? -Move! The backdoor. Go. Get out.
translation.de: -Wo bringen Sie die Kinder hin? -Los, hinten raus! Raus.

translation.en: Sit down. Sit down. Sit down.
[Carter grunts] Let us go.
Y'all gonna sit here, stay quiet for ten minutes,
translation.de: Ihr bleibt hier zehn Minuten still sitzen

translation.en: and then forget any of this ever happened.
translation.de: und vergesst, was ihr gesehen habt.

translation.en: If you don't, me and my brother will pay a little visit to your home. Understand?
translation.de: Falls nicht, kommen wir euch daheim besuchen. Klar?

translation.en: -[grunts] Help! -Hurry up.
-[Sam] Over here! -Mr. King!
[Carter] Frankie, stop!
Get up. Get up.
-[Frankie] Help! Help us! -[Carter] Let us go!
-[Syd] Get in the van. -[Frankie] Carter? [screams]
-[Titus] Wait. What are you doing? -They saw my face.
translation.de: -Was tust du? -Sie haben mein Gesicht gesehen.

translation.en: -Help! Someone, help us! -[Titus] They kids.
Now they've seen your face, too. Get in the van.
translation.de: Und jetzt auch deins. Steig ein.

translation.en: Please let us go.
-We didn't do anything. -Go on. Get in the van.
Please.
Help! Help!
Damn.
Is that your dog?
-[man] Easy! -[horn blaring]
Get out the way!
-You get this is kidnapping, right? -It's more like saving our butts.
translation.de: -Das ist eine Entführung. -Wir retten unsere Hintern.

translation.en: -[cell phone ringing] -Find the phone, Titus. Hurry up.
-Mommy! -Get rid of it.
-Get it out the window, idiot. -I'm getting it! [grunts]
[Titus] Please stop.
[Syd] We in too deep now, brother. We can't do that.
He's gone.
-[Titus] Stop driving! -We can't stop!
-[Titus] We can stop! -No, we can't!
[Titus] Syd, where are you taking us?
[Syd] Don't worry. I got this covered, I promise.
translation.de: Keine Sorge. Ich habe alles im Griff.

translation.en: Why are you so ugly?
Wanna say that again?
Hey! What are you doing back there?
Nothing. It's just my lunch.
-[Titus] What is that? -Do not take your eye off of him.
translation.de: -Was ist das? -Lass ihn nicht aus den Augen.

translation.en: Don't you never call me ugly. Never!
translation.de: Sag nie wieder, ich sei hässlich!

translation.en: Hurry up. Hurry up. Hurry up.
Tie 'em up in that back room.
-[Syd] Hurry up. -[Carter grunts] Let me go!
-Double knots. Put the tarp on the van. -[Titus] They ain't going anywhere.
translation.de: -Doppelknoten. Plane über den Bus. -Die bleiben hier.

translation.en: Give me your hands.
Please.
I'm almost done with my shift, and I haven't heard from you guys.
translation.de: Meine Schicht ist fast zu Ende, und ich habe euch nicht erreicht.

translation.en: I know that you're mad at me, but you have to tell me where you are.
translation.de: Ich weiß, ihr seid sauer, aber ihr müsst mir sagen, wo ihr seid.

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry.
And I love you.
So call me, okay?
What'd you pick this place for? Gives me the creeps.
translation.de: Wieso sind wir hier? Das ist gruselig.

translation.en: So nobody comes sniffing around.
-What're you doing, man? -Checking our score.
I mean with them. I didn't sign up for no kidnapping.
translation.de: Ich meine, mit denen. Ich wollte keine Entführung.

translation.en: Let me make something real clear to you.
There are people that want money from us,
translation.de: Es gibt Leute, die Geld von uns wollen,

translation.en: but we ain't got no money, do we?
So they gonna break every bone in our body instead.
translation.de: Also brechen sie uns alle Knochen.

translation.en: That what you signed up for?
I don't owe those people nothing. That's all you.
translation.de: Ich schulde den Leuten nichts, nur du.

translation.en: Who took care of you seven years, huh?
translation.de: Wer kümmerte sich sieben Jahre um dich?

translation.en: Food, clothes, all that?
I was the one who figured out a way
for us to keep on even when our own parents wouldn't.
translation.de: als es unsere Eltern nicht schafften.

translation.en: What I owe, you owe.
-All right. So what's the plan? -Sell all this, pay off our debt.
translation.de: -Ok. Wie lautet der Plan? -Das verkaufen, die Schulden bezahlen.

translation.en: Keep them around in case we need a get-out-of-jail-free card.
translation.de: Sie bleiben da als Versicherung gegen den Knast.

translation.en: And then what?
And then we no longer need 'em.
translation.de: Dann brauchen wir sie nicht mehr.

translation.en: She's cold.
[Syd] So what?
-So what? -I like this here watch.
A lot.
It actually reminds me of a watch my daddy had.
translation.de: Sie erinnert mich an die Uhr meines Vaters.

translation.en: Give it back!
Was this the reason y'all was in the shop today?
translation.de: Wart ihr deshalb heute im Pfandhaus?

translation.en: "To the man of my dreams.
I love you more than the moon and the stars.
translation.de: Ich liebe dich mehr als den Mond und die Sterne.

translation.en: Love, W." That's nice.
Let me work this here.
Your daddy run off. Got sick and tired of you, your old mama.
translation.de: Euer Papa ist abgehauen, hatte euch und eure Mama satt.

translation.en: So she sold it. It's good riddance.
But then, y'all want a little something something to remember him by.
translation.de: Aber dann wolltet ihr etwas, das euch an ihn erinnert.

translation.en: Ain't that right, little man?
Tell me how bad you want it.
Come on. Tell me.
It's yours, ain't it?
You can take it from me.
Take it. Take it.
What you scared of?
You're a little coward, huh?
Just like your old man.
Sic, Rott! Sic him!
-[Titus] We okay? -You, too, dumbo.
Go. Go!
Dumb move, dog.
Where are you?
Help!
Day keeps getting better.
Little doggie.
Where you at, baby boy?
Come out and play.
Little doggie.
Where are you?
I'm gonna skin you alive.
translation.de: Ich zieh dir das Fell ab.

translation.en: Gonna wipe that stupid grin off your face.
Where you at?
Come here, boy. Get this. Please, get this.
Good boy.
I hate that dog!
-[Carter] Please, Benji, hurry. -It's stuck. He can't get it.
-[Carter] Please, Benji. -Come on!
-[gasps] -Where is he?
[Syd] Oh, I think Rottie smells him.
-Where could he be? -[both gasp]
-Get him, Rott. -[Carter] No!
Run, Benji, run!
-[growling] -[Carter] Don't hurt him!
Run, Benji!
[Sam] Help! Get me out of here.
Hey, who is that?
-[panting] -Is that a dog?
What are you doing in here?
Puppy, bark for me!
Where'd you go, puppy? Come on, puppy.
Where'd you go? I know you're out there.
translation.de: Wo bist du? Ich weiß, dass du da bist.

translation.en: What are you doing out there?
Come on, puppy. Come on, puppy. Come on.
Hey, puppy, come on back now.
What're you...
Are you trying to get the lock?
Come on, puppy, you can do it! I know you can.
translation.de: Hündchen, du schaffst das! Ich weiß es.

translation.en: Come on, pup. Don't leave me now. Don't give up, puppy.
translation.de: Los, Hündchen. Lass mich nicht im Stich. Nicht aufgeben.

translation.en: Come on, baby. I know you can do it. Come on, puppy. You almost got it. Get it.
translation.de: Los, Hündchen. Du kannst es. Du hast es fast geschafft.

translation.en: Come on, pup. Come on, I know you can do it.
translation.de: Los, Hündchen. Ich weiß, du schaffst es.

translation.en: Puppy, thank you! You opened the door!
translation.de: Danke, Hündchen. Du hast die Tür aufgemacht!

translation.en: Yes, yes, hey. Good boy.
Wait. Where's Carter and Frankie?
translation.de: Moment. Wo sind Carter und Frankie?

translation.en: [Lyle] Yes, sir. I'll keep you posted. Yeah.
translation.de: Ja. Ich halte Sie auf dem Laufenden.

translation.en: Sam King? Sam King?
Detective Lyle Burton. How you doing?
-Hey. Listen. You got to find the kids. -Trust me, we're gonna find them.
translation.de: -Sie müssen die Kinder finden. -Das werden wir.

translation.en: Did you see what the guys look like?
translation.de: Wissen Sie, wie die Männer aussahen?

translation.en: -No, they were wearing-- -I got something.
Okay. Hold on for a second, okay? What you got? What you got?
I found it out back.
-Sam! Where's Frankie and Carter? -[Sam] Lord, Ms. Hughes, I'm so sorry.
translation.de: -Sam! Wo sind Frankie und Carter? -Ms. Hughes, es tut mir so leid.

translation.en: -What happened? -Ms. Hughes, I'm Detective Lyle Burton.
translation.de: -Was ist passiert? -Ich bin Detective Lyle Burton.

translation.en: -We're gonna do everything we can-- -Why were they even here?
translation.de: -Wir tun alles... -Warum waren sie überhaupt hier?

translation.en: -It's the watch. -The watch?
Your husband's watch.
The kids have been coming in every day almost trying to buy it back.
translation.de: Die Kinder kamen fast jeden Tag, um sie zurückzukaufen.

translation.en: I told them that I sold it. I didn't know that they'd come in here to...
translation.de: Ich sagte, dass ich sie verkauft habe. Ich wusste nicht, dass sie...

translation.en: -Hey! What... -Get him. What...
-What is he doing here? -That dog saved me.
translation.de: -Was macht er hier? -Der Hund rettete mich.

translation.en: -Is he yours? -No. What... He what?
He got me out of the dang closet they locked me in.
translation.de: Er befreite mich aus der Kammer, in die sie mich sperrten.

translation.en: [Lyle] We need to follow procedure, okay?
[Sam] I think he's trying to tell you something.
translation.de: Ich glaube, er will Ihnen was sagen.

translation.en: Ms. Hughes! Ms. Hughes!
Stay put. Requesting backup. I got a 2-12 on foot.
translation.de: Bleibt hier. Fordert Verstärkung an. Fluchtversuch zu Fuß.

translation.en: [woman on radio] Suspect identification?
Uh, brown hair, 35 pounds, four legs.
You wanna repeat that, Burton?
Not especially.
[woman] We're parked down there.
[Lyle] Ms. Hughes, let me do my job.
I'm following that dog.
[Lyle] Listen, we'll find them.
-We will follow the dog. Just come on. -Fine. Let's go.
translation.de: -Wir folgen dem Hund. Kommen Sie. -Gut. Los.

translation.en: -Hey, hold up, hold up. -[Whitney] Sam?
About to catch a heart attack.
Get in the car. Let's go!
Hey, hey. No, no, no, you wait. Wait here. I got it.
translation.de: Nein, Sie warten hier. Ich mache das.

translation.en: Must be out of my doggoned mind.
The heck you sniffing around for?
What you got?
What? What is that?
Pudding? Does it look like I want pudding?
translation.de: Pudding? Denkst du, ich will Pudding?

translation.en: -[barks] -What will I do with that?
Is that why you brought us here?
And then you walk off. Great.
translation.de: Und dann haust du ab. Toll.

translation.en: Stop. Just stop.
No, stop. Just stop!
Do you have any idea how much time I've wasted?
translation.de: Ist dir klar, wie viel Zeit ich verschwendet habe?

translation.en: My kids are... [sighs]
I don't wanna see you ever again. Go.
Do you hear me? Go!
What the heck were you thinking, Street? We got procedure, son.
translation.de: Was haben Sie sich da gedacht? Es gibt Vorschriften.

translation.en: Sir, I know. I got carried away.
Ms. Hughes? Here's a cup of jasmine tea. It manifests good fortune.
translation.de: Ms. Hughes? Eine Tasse Jasmintee. Das bringt Glück.

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
How much money had they saved up?
translation.de: Wie viel Geld hatten sie gespart?

translation.en: It doesn't matter. I should've given them the watch back.
translation.de: Das ist egal. Ich hätte ihnen die Uhr geben sollen.

translation.en: No, I never should have sold it.
translation.de: Ich hätte sie nie verkaufen sollen.

translation.en: I should've done something
so they didn't think that buying a watch would make it all okay.
translation.de: dass sie glauben, die Uhr zurückzukaufen, brächte alles in Ordnung.

translation.en: The honest truth is, Ms. Hughes...
I didn't give the watch back, 'cause I like having 'em come in.
translation.de: ...ich gab ihnen die Uhr nicht, weil ich mochte, dass sie kamen.

translation.en: Those two, they got nothing but love in 'em.
translation.de: Die beiden sind so was von lieb.

translation.en: -I got something. -It's Carter's.
A traffic cop found it.
No usable prints, but it's a starting point, location-wise.
translation.de: Keine Fingerabdrücke, aber es ist eine erste Spur.

translation.en: Hey, come on. Give me my phone back.
Don't eat the rubber ducky. Give me that back. Good boy. Good boy.
translation.de: Nicht auffressen. Gib es mir. So ist es brav.

translation.en: -Who's a good boy? -[Frankie] What's his name, anyways?
[Carter] I don't think he has one. He's a stray.
translation.de: Ich glaube, er hat keinen. Er ist ein Streuner.

translation.en: Hey, where did you come from, buddy? Do you need a home?
translation.de: Wo kommst du her? Suchst du ein Zuhause?

translation.en: [Frankie] What are you thinking? What if Mom finds out?
translation.de: Was denkst du dir? Was, wenn Mama es erfährt?

translation.en: [Carter] I'm thinking he's lonely.
[Carter] What are we gonna name him?
[Frankie] Like there's even a reason to name him. Mom will never let us keep him.
translation.de: Es ist sinnlos, ihm einen Namen zu geben. Mama will ihn nicht.

translation.en: [Carter] It's kind of like...
when Dad got sick, Mom did, too.
translation.de: ...als Papa krank wurde und Mama auch.

translation.en: [Frankie] I miss Dad, but I miss Mom even more.
translation.de: Papa fehlt mir, aber Mama noch mehr.

translation.en: [Carter] I know, Fritter. I know.
[somber song playing] ♪ When the road gets dark ♪
♪ And you can no longer see ♪
♪ Just let my love throw a spark ♪
translation.de: Soll meine Liebe dir ein Funke sein

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
♪ When the tears you cry ♪
♪ Are all you can believe ♪
♪ Just give these lovin' arms a try Baby ♪
translation.de: Dann lass dich in den Arm nehmen

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
♪ And when your back's against the wall ♪
translation.de: Wenn du nicht mehr weiter weißt

translation.en: [man] Hey, dog!
♪ Just turn around and you will see ♪
translation.de: Dreh dich um und du wirst sehen

translation.en: ♪ I will catch you I will catch your fall, baby ♪
♪ Just have a little faith in me ♪
[Syd] Come on, what'd I tell you? Hear me, boy?
translation.de: Was habe ich gesagt. Hörst du?

translation.en: -We'll get out of here. -I don't wanna go anymore.
Look at my face. See how much I care?
translation.de: Siehst du, wie mich das interessiert?

translation.en: Go on. Come on, Titus. Let's go.
Uh... What are we doing, man?
Listen. I know a guy, all right?
He's gonna buy our score and take us up river.
translation.de: Er kauft unsere Beute ab und bringt uns flussaufwärts.

translation.en: [Titus] I mean, with them.
They're coming with us. Come on.
What are you saying?
Don't worry your pretty little head about it.
What y'all doing over there?
-Nothing. -Nothing.
-Ain't we clever? -[barking]
No, please. No.
-No, please, please. -Please. Please.
Let me be real clear...
I don't need but one of y'all to be my insurance policy. You hear me?
translation.de: Mir genügt einer von euch als Versicherung. Klar?

translation.en: Get goin'. Go on.
-Ms. Hughes... -I have to go find my kids.
-Just give me a second. -I can't just sit here any longer.
-I have to go. -You have to be rational.
Ms. Hughes! I have a lead.
translation.de: Ms. Hughes! Ich habe eine Spur.

translation.en: What?
This van. It was stolen two days ago.
translation.de: Der Bus wurde vor zwei Tagen gestohlen.

translation.en: -And you think that they're in there? -Yeah.
translation.de: Sie glauben, da sind sie drin?

translation.en: It raced out of the quarter down towards the river.
That's right where the dog was taking us.
-It's just a coincidence. -How is that a coincidence?
-Listen, the house was empty. -Maybe you didn't look hard enough.
translation.de: -Das Haus war leer. -Vielleicht haben Sie nicht genug gesucht.

translation.en: You're talking as if you think a dog is smarter than the police.
translation.de: Sie reden, als wäre der Hund schlauer als die Polizei.

translation.en: I'm going back to the house.
translation.de: Ich gehe zurück zu dem Haus.

translation.en: We need to follow protocol this time!
translation.de: Diesmal müssen wir die Vorschriften beachten.

translation.en: I don't think that dog was following any kind of protocol.
translation.de: Der Hund hat keine Vorschriften befolgt.

translation.en: I think he was following his heart.
If anybody ask, I'm following the lead, all right?
translation.de: Falls wer fragt, ich folge der Spur, ok?

translation.en: Don't you worry. I'm real good at not telling the police things.
translation.de: Keine Sorge. Ich bin gut darin, der Polizei nichts zu verraten.

translation.en: Boat's coming in, Syd.
[Syd] I'm on lookout. Flag him down. He's got the cash for the loot.
translation.de: Ich halte Ausschau. Gib ihm Zeichen. Er hat das Geld für die Ware.

translation.en: There's our ride.
Stay.
Carter, I always pretend like I'm not scared,
translation.de: Carter, ich tue immer so, als hätte ich keine Angst.

translation.en: but I'm really scared.
Please, God.
Please help us get back home.
Please, please, please.
This wasn't open before.
Are you sure?
I'm sure.
[Lyle] Oh, you got to be kidding me.
-[Whitney] What? What is that? -Hey, relax.
It's an underground transport tunnel,
built way back for things you don't even wanna know about.
translation.de: gebaut für Dinge, von denen Sie lieber nichts wissen.

translation.en: -You think they went... Carter! Frankie! -What you doing?
translation.de: -Sie denken, sie... Carter! Frankie! -Was tun Sie?

translation.en: -Those are my kids! -Relax. Listen. We can cut 'em off.
translation.de: -Das sind meine Kinder! -Wir schneiden ihnen den Weg ab.

translation.en: -There's a river. I'll make a call. Okay? -Okay.
translation.de: Dort ist ein Fluss. Ich mache Meldung. Ok?

translation.en: -Wait! Give me your keys. -Huh?
translation.de: Halt! Geben Sie mir den Schlüssel.

translation.en: -I drive an ambulance for a living. -No.
No!
You call this driving?
Not yet.
[Carter] Benji! Help!
[Frankie] Help us!
[man] Here's your money. We leave in five.
translation.de: Hier ist euer Geld. Wir legen in fünf Minuten ab.

translation.en: You're not your brother.
translation.de: Du bist nicht wie dein Bruder.

translation.en: My brother thinks I'm stupid.
translation.de: Mein Bruder hält mich für dumm.

translation.en: He thinks he's the boss of me.
translation.de: Er denkt, er wäre mein Boss.

translation.en: -But I can make decisions for myself. -Yeah.
That's why I'm taking this here cash...
all for me...
and bailin'...
so I don't never have to listen to another thing he says...
translation.de: ...damit ich mir sein Gelaber nie wieder...

translation.en: never again.
Who's ugly now?
Hey, my man! Can you help us out? Have you seen these two kids?
translation.de: Hallo. Haben Sie diese beiden Kinder gesehen?

translation.en: A van? Anything out of the ordinary?
No, sir, I never seen 'em.
[Frankie faintly] Help! Help!
-That her dog? -Yeah. Whether she knows it or not.
translation.de: -Ist das ihr Hund? -Ja. Auch wenn sie es nicht weiß.

translation.en: Okay, I'm requesting backup. I'm at the boatyard, right off...
translation.de: Ich brauche Verstärkung an der Werft, direkt bei...

translation.en: -[growling] -It's a little late, you idiot.
Come on, I thought we was friends.
-Gotcha, slick. -[grunts]
You got the right to pretty much nothing.
translation.de: Sie haben das Recht zu so gut wie gar nichts.

translation.en: [man] Cut the rope, idiot!
[pants] Don't you ever quit?
You thought that dog was gonna save you?
translation.de: Du dachtest, der Hund rettet euch?

translation.en: You're not going anywhere.
-Yeah, we are. -What are you gonna do, big man?
About time.
I love you, Benji.
He didn't give up.
-Good boy. Good boy. -[Whitney] Benji.
-I love you. -I don’t have to say goodbye.
translation.de: -Ich hab dich lieb. -Ich muss nicht Abschied nehmen.

translation.en: -[Whitney] Thank God. -Thank you.
[Syd] Get your hands off me.
[Lyle] Whoa, whoa, whoa. I got him. I got him.
Thank you.
This is going back where it belongs.
translation.de: Die geht an ihren Besitzer zurück.

translation.en: Watch your head.
Did good today. Good boy.
What you doing?
[chuckles] Oh, I had no idea.
You're a good girl. You're a very good girl.
translation.de: Du bist ein braves Mädchen. Ein sehr braves.

translation.en: [mouthing] Thank you.
[Carter] Good boy.
-[Frankie] I'm so glad you're back. -[Carter] We're keeping him, right?
translation.de: -Zum Glück bist du wieder da. -Wir behalten ihn, oder?

translation.en: -[Whitney sighs] I don't know. -Mom!
[Whitney] We're definitely keeping him.
translation.de: Wir behalten ihn auf jeden Fall.

translation.en: [Frankie] We're gonna bake cookies and play dress up and you can help me with ballet.
translation.de: Wir backen Kekse, verkleiden uns, und du hilfst mir beim Ballett.

translation.en: [Carter] Stop. You're scaring him.
translation.de: Hör auf. Du machst ihm Angst.

translation.en: [upbeat song playing] ♪ I feel love ♪
♪ All around ♪
♪ I can feel it ♪
♪ Shinin' down ♪
♪ It lights up the day Like the mornin' sun ♪
translation.de: Sie macht den Tag hell wie die Sonne

translation.en: ♪ Reachin' out and touchin' everyone ♪
♪ I feel love ♪
♪ All day long ♪
♪ Like a promise ♪
♪ Like a song ♪
♪ And it's feelin' good ♪
translation.de: Und es fühlt sich gut an

translation.en: ♪ Like I knew it would ♪
♪ Everywhere I go ♪
♪ I feel love ♪
[gentle song playing] ♪ If your heart believes in dreamin' ♪
translation.de: Wenn dein Herz an Träume glaubt

translation.en: ♪ There's no other place I know ♪
♪ Well, life here rolls on by Without a care for tomorrow ♪
translation.de: Wo das Leben vergeht Ohne Sorgen wegen morgen

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, that was the life for me That was the life for me ♪
translation.de: Ja, das war ein Leben für mich

translation.en: ♪ How long must I travel On this journey? ♪
♪ Guess I'll count a million stars Along the way ♪
translation.de: Ich werde unterwegs wohl Eine Million Sterne zählen

translation.en: ♪ And every time I start to worry ♪
translation.de: Und jedes Mal, wenn ich mich sorge

translation.en: ♪ Something whispers in my ear ♪
♪ Says the words I long to hear ♪
translation.de: Sagt die Worte, die ich ersehne

translation.en: ♪ Almost home I'm almost home ♪
translation.de: Fast daheim Ich bin fast daheim

translation.en: ♪ Might be lost and afraid But I'm just a dream away ♪
translation.de: Ich mag mich verirrt haben, mich fürchten Aber ich bin nur einen Traum weit entfernt

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home I'm almost home ♪
♪ Feel so cold and alone ♪
translation.de: Es ist so kalt und einsam

translation.en: ♪ But I'm almost home ♪
♪ Just one more mile And I'll be home free ♪
translation.de: Nur noch eine Meile Dann bin ich daheim

translation.en: ♪ Just one more day Is all my heart needs ♪
translation.de: Nur noch ein Tag Mehr braucht mein Herz nicht

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna get there ♪
♪ Yeah, I'm gonna get there someday ♪
translation.de: Ja, eines Tages werde ich ankommen

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home ♪
♪ On my own ♪
♪ Might be lost and afraid But I'll get there someday ♪
translation.de: Ich mag mich verirrt haben, mich fürchten Aber ich werde irgendwann ankommen

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home Almost home ♪
♪ Feel so cold and alone But I'm... ♪
translation.de: Es ist so kalt und einsam Aber ich...

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home ♪
[man] Action.
[man] Cut it.
